name: Hello (Demo)
description:
Music for enjoying the game:


`W` or `UP` - jump.

`D` or `RIGHT` - Moving to the right.

`A` or `LEFT` - Moving to the left.

Do not touch the red crawling creatures, otherwise the player will move to the beginning of the map.

Please note that the game uses an alpha version of the world generator, so it can sometimes create impassable levels. In this case, just click `Menu`->`New Game` button.
